full_summary:
================

### Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) General Contractor Tender

**Reference Number:** WS4110379609-Doc4162577573
**Solicitation Number:** WS4110379609
**Publication Date:** 2023-09-08
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-10, 14:00:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)

**Notice:**
Please disregard the posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All requisite supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by 2023-10-10 at 14:00 EDT. Bids submitted after this time will be declared non-responsive.

### Tender Overview:
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks a qualified General Contractor to provide specialized trade construction and maintenance services for the 17 Wing Detachment Dundurn, in Dundurn, Saskatchewan. The Work includes carpentry services, as specified in the Statement of Work, and encompasses all buildings located on Highway 11, between Saskatoon and Hanley, Saskatchewan. The Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) includes a three-year term with an optional one-year extension.

**Key Services:**
- Labour, materials, tools, and equipment supply
- Sub-trade services
- Travel and administration costs
- Supervision and demolition services
- Goods and material purchases

### Selection Criteria:
The tender will be awarded to the bidder offering the lowest price.

### Notice URL:
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17400445?extsite=MTc0MDA0NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17400445?extsite=MTc0MDA0NDVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
